name: II.co.uk Discussions Dark Mode
description: Dark mode for interactive investor discussions site located https://www.ii.co.uk/discussion.  Easier on the eyes especially if browsing in the evening. This is still in development so currently in beta (like the site ha ha) and tested with Google Chrome only.  If you have issues drop us a message.  I'm checking the discussion site daily and tweaking if necessary so check back on a regular basis for any updates/fixes
additional_info:
0.1 14/06/2018 - Major update.  Removed scrolling on portfolio view and fixed create new topic.  Includes numerous tweaks to improve the dark styling.  The main site isn't quite there though but my main focus is the discussion site itself

0.2 16/06/2018 - Main site front page is working but don't for now assume other pages from the main site to work

0.3 17/06/2018 - Further colour tweaks as II are updating their discussion site based on feedback 
so l have to update the styles in tandem.  I've also managed to limit the styling to the discussion site only 
so the main site will use the original colours ensuring l don't break anything there

0.4 18/06/2018 - Further tweaking of some styles l missed.  Only issue i'm seeing is creating new topics 
isn't quite there and needs further refinement

0.5 05/07/2018 - Since II are updating their site background table colour where multiple tags used 
corrected for dark mode
